entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No suggestions in switch expression arm when dotting on an enum type in a `Color Color` case #75350
    Backlog
  • No code actions available for member in documentation comment when member is not known #75349
    Backlog
  • Suggest name when naming tuple item #75347
    Backlog
  • Assert fails with collection expression of bools #75343
    17.13
  • Feature Request: Namespaced autocomplete #75342
  • InvalidOperationException in DocumentHighlighting.AbstractDocumentHighlightsService.AddLocationSpanAsync #75337

Closed

  • Pattern match condition in ternary resulting in collection expression fails to parse; ternary appears to be mis-parsed as nullability modifier #75318
    17.13
  • ITypeSymbol.NullableAnnotation is NotAnnotated for System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault's return type #75119
  • `await foreach` utilizing struct enumerator never ends #72820
    17.13
  • [Bug]: Choosing IntelliSense member for `abstract override` does not generate corresponding code snippet #72338
  • [LSP] [Bug]: Retroactively adding keywords in front of any token can sometimes delete it #68539
    18.0
  • Natural delegate type depends on order of candidates #71333
    17.12
  • XML Literal Hot Reload Issue #75231
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35401.79 #75333
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35401.85 #75332

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations and UI thread CPU costs in WithDoNotCreateCreationPolicy #75358
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable OverflowOnFluentCall_ExtensionMethods test #75357
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update status for `field` keyword feature #75356
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Avoid linking back to the original TreeSource in document state updates if the associated lazy is already completed #75355
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make the types in CSharp Features sealed #75352
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations during typing #75351
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't update xaml tool #75348
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75346
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Added "propr" snippet for required properties #75339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use primary constructor in rename command handler #75336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix ambiguity parsing collection in conditional expressions #75328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75345
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Make types in Workspace layer sealed #75321
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75330
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode, Next
  • Fixes comparison of VB XML literals #75301
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix null coalescing operator emit with span conversion #75103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2550589 #75334
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75360
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75359
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix crash with Dispose method with params #75305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only provide fallback options for host analyzers #75317
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report error for native PDB limit #75293
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow accessing ref fields through rvalues #75316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Convert more lambda rude edits to runtime rude edits #75285
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
